title: Soracte (mountain)
description: Soracte M. (Monte Soratte) is a mountain near Rome, Italy, the highest peak of which rises to 691 masl (2,267 ft). A site of ritual activity in antiquity, the mountain was sacred to Dis Pater.

properties.description: coordinates after GeoHack, verified in Google Earth.
properties.title: Imagery location of Soracte M.
